channel.title: Camcorder help
channel.description: ok i have a video camera n its on those mivi cassetes one.. but i wanted to know if u can like hook up the camera to my computer with the usb n take the video off the cassete n put it onto my hardrive that way i can burn the videos onto a DVD.. the camera i have came with a program but it doesnt install on vista sadly.. n i also tried to look for the newer version if they have one but they dont.. so can someone plz help me all ineed is like a name of a program that will let me do this.. thanks :)

item.title: Camcorder help
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Is it a mini dv or 8mm camcorder?

Read full topic

item.title: Camcorder help
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yes. Mini cassette you mean mini dv tapes?

Yes. But you need a firewire cord, and capture software.

Usually Adobe Premiere Pro, Windows Movie Maker, Final Cut Pro, etc will work.

I use HDVSplit, but I’m working with HDV, not DV, so.

Read full topic
